name: Run Salmon Run
description:
(If you're playing on desktop browser, you'll have to fullscreen/un-fullscreen for the UI to play nice)
(For a more polished, offline desktop experience, feel free to download the zip further down)

(A Foddian Game for the Ludwig Game Jam.)

During Alaskan summers, salmon can be found swimming upstream rivers during spawning season.

You are one such salmon.

Can you make it to the top of the river in one piece?

A/D - move the fish's head left/right

Left/Right Arrow Keys - move the fish's tail left/right (do this repeatedly to swim. your fingers will get tired. i am not sorry)

Spacebar (hold) - float

Beware of hawks, bears, and strong currents. And remember to take breaks.

Credits:

Art and Programming - Mr. Thee

Music, SFX, cover image - hyakulegger
